Name: Dr. Aswathy M Nair
Qualification: BAMS (KMCT Ayurveda Medical College, Kozhikkode, 2016)
Description:
Dr. Aswathy M Nair, the Chief Physician and Director of Ayurmayi Ayurveda is a young and enthusiastic Ayurvedic practitioner. Enabling everyone to live a healthy life is the aim of Ayurmayi Ayurveda. Dr. Aswathy strictly follows the ancient methods of treatment followed in Ayurveda and personally involved in consultation and therapies. She is always observant to the health disorders and remarkably decisive and focused. 
Ayurmayi is a well-known centre for providing the best ayurvedic treatment in Kerala. Our traditional Kerala Ayurvedic Treatments in Trivandrum Centre is Clinically proven and scientific. All treatments at Ayurmayi is simple and complete by all means. Ayurmayi Ayurvedic Treatment Centre believes in curing the diseases, preventing it and helping everyone by guiding them to a healthy life by following the right ways in diet, exercise, sleep, action, and thoughts. Ayurmayi provides the best and genuine ayurvedic treatments in Kerala under the guidance of expert doctors. Our Abhyanga, traditional oil massage treatment is a natural way to relax, refresh and rejuvenate your mind and body. In addition to moisturizing and nourishing your skin, the massage provides relief from various skeletal, respiratory and neurological aliments. Ayurmayi's main focus is on providing Ayurvedic Post Delivery Care Treatments. Prasava Raksha at Ayurmayi helps the new mother overcome delivery exertion and vata dosha, reduces stretch marks, prevents infections and helps in strengthening uterus
Hospital Address: Ayurmayi Ayurveda Clinic , Rose Nagar Road, Sreekaryam, Thiruvananthapuram, 695017

Name: Dr. Bimal John
Qualification: MBBS (Kasturba Medical  College, 1999), MS - Obstetrics & Gynaecology (M S Ramaiah Medical College, Bangalore, 2004)
Description: Dr. Bimal John is a Senior Consultant Laparoscopic Surgeon and specialist in Assisted Reproduction Technology (ART) with over 12 years of clinical experience. He has obtained his fellowship in advanced endoscopic surgery from the renowned Clermont Ferrand University in France and underwent further training at the International School of Surgical Anatomy (ISSA) in Verona, Italy and the Kiel School of Gynecological Surgery, Germany. He is also a faculty and presenter at the American Association of Gynecological Laparoscopists (AAGL) annual meetings since 2009. He is the reviewer for the prestigious Journal of Minimally Invasive Gynecology (JMIG). He has contributed several research papers, reviews, book chapters and published several informative articles on gynaecological disorders. He won the Gold medal at the Asia Pacific International Hysteroscopy Congress 2018 for the best oral presentation. He is actively involved in Endometriosis research as well as in patient education, and runs the Facebook patient's group Endometriosis India.
Hospital Address: Credence Specialty Clinic , 6th Floor, Credence Hospital, Ulloor,, Ulloor, Thiruvananthapuram, 695011

Name: Dr. Madhav Chandran B
Qualification: MDS - Orthodontics (Coorg Institute of Dental Sciences, Virajpat, 2016), BDS (PMS College of Dental Science  Research, 2012)
Description:
I am the resident orthodontist at sunshine dental specialists. I specialize in the correction of malaligned teeth, proclaimed teeth, interceptive orthodontic practices involving children of ages 6-14 years, and smile designing, clear aligners and so on.

I am currently working as an assistant professor at Sri Sankara dental college, Varkala, Trivandrum. I am only one of 6 dentists from India and only one from Kerala to have a fellowship of AOO (Accelerated Osteogenic Orthodontics) from the USA which deals with different methods of accelerating orthodontic treatment. I specialize in fast and efficient orthodontic treatment which can be finished within 6-12 months, unlike regular orthodontic treatment which takes up to 24 months and above to finish.

I also hold a BLS (basic life support) certification from the prestigious American heart association. I strive to be up-to-date with the latest developments in my profession and is constantly upgrading my knowledge and my technology to stay abreast with the best in the world, to provide the best available treatment for my patients
Hospital Address: Thiruvananthapuram , Government Dental College, TV Medical College, Thiruvananthapuram, None

Name: Dr. Maya Vincent
Qualification: MBBS (Government Medical College,Thiruvananthapuram, 1973), MD - Dermatology , Venereology & Leprosy (Government Medical College,Thiruvananthapuram, 2000)
Description:
Dr.Maya Vincent, MD (D&V)

Senior Consultant
Former Civil Surgeon Grade 1 Health Services,
Govt. of Kerala
(PG from Medical College Trivandrum)

Was employed as Civil Surgeon in Kerala Health Services Department from 1979 to 2006. Here worked as Resource person for HIV/AIDS giving training to doctors and classesfor the public . Had worked as Pediatric Dermatologist and Dermatologist in charge of Reproductory Tract Clinic at Women and Children Hospital, Thycaud, Trivandrum till retirement in 2006. Then joined Yogiraj Centr for Dermatology and Cosmetology in 2006 and still continuing as Senior Consultant and Consultant in charge of Paediatric Dermatology Clinic. Also familiar with all Dermato surgical procedures and Laser treatments and Cosmetic procedures. Conducted workshops on Injection of Botox and Dermal fillers at YCDC.

Conferences Attended

■State and National level Conference of IADVL and Pediatric Dermatology
■Conference of European Hair Research Society at Jerusalem, Israel
■World Dermatology Conference, Vancouver, Canada
■Acsicon at Wayanad

Paper Presentations

■Poster Presentation at EHRS Conference at Jerusalem in 2011
■Paper Selected for EHRS Conference at Barcelona, Spain
■Paper presented at State Conferences of IADVL in 2002 and 2010
■Took part in Debate at CME organized by IADVL, Trivandrum

Publications

■Co-author of paper on Cutaneous Histoplasmosis in the International journal of Dermatology, Venereology and Leprology
2. Paper 0n Alopecia  and its relation to Thyroid disorder- an observational study in International Journal of Trichology

Name: Dr. Murari Kaimal
Qualification: MBBS (Academy of Medical Sciences Pariyaram Kannur, 2008), MS - ENT (THE WEST BENGAL UNIVERSITY OF HEALTH SCIENCES, 2018)
Description:
Dr. Murari Kaimal is an  Internationally renowned ENT surgeon with more than 16 plus years clinical experience and Advanced training in Endoscopic nose, sinus and laryngeal surgeries. Dr. Murari Kaimal did his initial education in Trivandrum Kerala, completed his MBBS from one of the prestigious Government medical colleges, got selected and served in the Indian Air Force (IAF) as a decorated officer Squadron Leader (Major), where he received the Prestigious commendation from the Director General of Medical Services (Air)  himself and completed MS-ENT Head neck surgery as a University Gold medalist from one of the Premier top 5 medical centre in India under the Armed forces. Following this he won the International ENT quiz and research paper in International ENT conference and was subsequently selected for Rhinology, facial plastics training in UK, where he was successfully practising as an ENT Head neck surgeon with a special interest in Endoscopic/ robotic Rhinology and Voice/ airway services along with LASER and Botox applications. Extensively published in international peer-reviewed journals, including presentations at many National and International platforms. His interest in cutting-edge technology led him to get advanced training and Certifications from Cambridge, UK and Stanford, USA in Artificial Intelligence in Medicine and is currently one of the Pioneer experts in the field of AI  in healthcare advising and consulting many startups and tech companies and expert consultant panel of CLG, M3 global research and other organisations. 
Registered to practice in 4+  countries with GMC-UK, DHA-Dubai,  NMC-India and European body  as Consultant ENT Head & Neck surgeon . A prestigious Life member of Association of Otolaryngologists India, ENT-UK, European Rhinology society, Global Rhinology Network, European Association of Allergy and Immunoligy, Currently, he is back in India and taken over as Managing Director and Chief Consultant ENT surgeon at the prestigious The  New England Medical Centre.
Hospital Address: The New England Medical Centre , VP - 461 B, Krishna Tower, Trivandrum, Peyad, Thiruvananthapuram, 695573

Description:
Dr.Ranjith.R is a consultant interventional cardiologist currently working at General hospital Trivandrum, Kerala. He was previously associated with govt district hospital Palakkad for 3 years before joining the present institution.He completed his MBBS from the Academy of Medical Sciences Pariyaram, Kannur, Kerala, in 2005. He then did his post-graduation from Govt. MKCG Medical College in Berhampur, Orissa, and received the MD (General Medicine) degree in 2010. Dr. Ranjith moved back to Kerala in the following year and was based at Govt. TD Medical College in Alappuzha for the DM (Cardiology) super specialty degree, which he was awarded in 2014. He also completed a Fellowship in Diabetology (DFID) in 2014-15 from Christian Medical College (Vellore), and post graduate diploma in Diabetes Management from Middlesex University, London.
Dr. Ranjith 's fields of interest and expertise include complex coronary interventions, peripheral interventions, pacemaker therapy and interventions on adult congenital heart diseases.

Name: Dr. Rushi P Vyas
Qualification: BHMS (University of Pune, 1998)
Description:
Dr. Rushi Vyas is a highly skilled and qualified doctor who has been practicing for more than 22 years. He holds a Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery (BHMS) from University of Pune. Further he also perused fellowship course in homeopathic dermatology, Maharashtra University of Health Sciences, Nashik and certificate Course in Homeopathic Oncology, from Dr Batra’s Academy. 

●        Personalized and comprehensive care: Dr. Rushi is passionate about providing his patients with personalized care that is tailored to their unique needs. He takes a comprehensive approach to healthcare, addressing all aspects of his patient's physical and mental well-being.

●        Focus on preventive healthcare: Dr. Rushi believes in the importance of preventive healthcare and is committed to helping his patients maintain optimal health and well-being. He works with his patients to develop strategies for preventing illness and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

●        Professional excellence: Dr. Rushi specializes in acute as well as chronic ailments, especially in allergic bronchitis, asthma, arthritis, migraine, hair fall, irritable bowel syndrome, skin diseases, piles, musculoskeletal disorders, children's diseases, digestive problems, genitourinary disorders and gynecological disorders, among others.

●        Mentor certified professional: As a mentor certified professional, Dr. Rushi is dedicated to helping his patients learn about their health and make informed decisions about their healthcare. He provides guidance and support to his patients, helping them navigate complex healthcare issues.

●	Excellent communication skills: Dr. Rushi Vyas is fluent in English, Hindi and Gujrati, which allows her to effectively communicate with her patients and build strong relationships with them. He can explain complex medical concepts in a way that is easy for her patients to understand, which helps to facilitate effective communication and better health outcomes.


Dr. Rushi is a compassionate homeopath who is currently associated with Dr. Batras Positive Health Clinic Pvt. Ltd. Through his exceptional healthcare services, he has touched the lives of many patients, providing them with the highest level of care and support. His dedication and commitment to His patients are true evidence to his kind and caring nature, making his an invaluable asset to the clinic and the community.

Name: Dr. Trishna Devarajan
Qualification: BNYS (SDM College of Naturopathy & Yogic Sciences, Ujire, 2004), MA - Psychology (IGNOU, 2017)
Description:
Dr Trishna Devarajan is a medical graduate  [BNYS] in Naturopathic medicine, Therapeutic Yoga and Clinical Acupuncture. She has a PG in Psychology and Yoga Therapy too. Her area of expertise is lifestyle diseases both prevention and management. She has a keen interest in the field of mental health too. 
The method of treatment is based on Lifestyle intervention which includes detailed medical, lifestyle and diet history during the first visit followed by therapeutic dietary advice, lifestyle modifications, counselling, Yoga therapy and Mindfulness and Acupuncture  based on health conditions. Highly personalized diet plans, Yoga and Mindfulness  intervention and Acupuncture is the hallmark of the treatment protocol. Diseases that can be effectively managed are Obesity, Diabetes, Hypertension and Cardiovascular diseases, Dyslipidaemia, Acid peptic disease, Neurological conditions, Spondyloarthropathies, Pain and stress management, Infertility, PCOS , Allergic rhinitis, Bronchial asthma. Irritable bowel syndrome, Inflammatory bowel disease, Mild depression, anxiety, Past stroke rehab, Parkinson's disease etc.
Hospital Address: Center For Integrated Healing , CG 28, Cinnamon Gardens, Vazhayila, Perurkada, Thiruvananthapuram, 682030

Name: Ms. Vishnupriya
Qualification: M.Sc - Counselling and Family Therapy (Indira Gandhi Open University, 2022)
Description:
Ms. Vishnupriya is a  counseling psychologist with over two years of experience dedicated to fostering mental health awareness and providing therapeutic support. In addition to her clinical work, She contribute articles to The Indian Express, where she share insights and knowledge on various mental health topics. Her writings aim to educate the public, reduce stigma, and promote understanding of psychological issues in the Indian context.

Through her practice, she  utilize evidence-based therapeutic techniques tailored to each client’s unique needs, focusing on fostering resilience and emotional well-being. She expertises encompasses a wide range of issues, including anxiety, depression, stress management, and relationship challenges.

Passionate about mental health advocacy, She strive to bridge the gap between professional psychology and public understanding, encouraging individuals to prioritize their mental health and seek support when needed. She  is committed to continuous learning and professional development, ensuring that she stay updated with the latest research and therapeutic practices in the field.
Hospital Address: Aathma The Healing , Number 15/2461, Ground Floor, Sreedharam, Vellayambalam, Thiruvananthapuram, 695010
